effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to bring the power of the Light to bear against your foes. A Spark of Beledar judges them, dealing 181,252 Radiant damage while marking them. Your next Spark against them will consume the mark to deal an additional 155,359 Radiant damage.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gauntlets of Shackled Elements

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 80 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 916 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 916 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
